# CAM::ARE_WIDESCREEN_BORDERS_ACTIVE

## Summary
Are the widescreen borders still visible on the screen

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
set via SET_WIDESCREEN_BORDERS
